title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving effect to Articles 14 and 17 of Regulation
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Sustainability-
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Sustainability-

related Disclosures in the Financial Services Sector) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (sustainability- related disclosure financial service sector) regulation 2021

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving effect to Articles 14 and 17 of Regulation
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations “SFD Regulation” means Regulation (EU)
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations “SFD Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 
2019/2088 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 November 20192 
on sustainability‐related disclosures in the financial services sector. 

(2) A word or expression which is used in these Regulations and which is 
also used in the SFD Regulation has, unless the context otherwise requires, the 
same meaning in these Regulations as it has in the SFD Regulation.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation sfd regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2088 european parliament council 27 november 20192 sustainability-related disclosure financial service sector (2) word expression used regulation also used sfd regulation unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation sfd regulation

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving effect to Articles 14 and 17 of Regulation
heading: 3. Compliance with the requirements of the SFD Regulation by financial
text_raw:
3. Compliance with the requirements of the SFD Regulation by financial 
market participants and financial advisers shall be monitored by the Central 
Bank of Ireland, being the competent authority referred to in Article 14 of the 
SFD Regulation, other than in the case of - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

a pan-European personal pension product (PEPP) provider, 

an institution for occupational retirement provision (IORP), and 

a manufacturer of a pension product where the manufacturer is an 
institution for occupational retirement provision (IORP).
text_norm: 3 compliance requirement sfd regulation financial market participant financial adviser shall monitored central bank ireland competent authority referred article 14 sfd regulation case - (a) (b) (c) pan-european personal pension product (pepp) provider institution occupational retirement provision (iorp) manufacturer pension product manufacturer institution occupational retirement provision (iorp)

title: 1972) and for the purpose of giving effect to Articles 14 and 17 of Regulation
heading: 4. Notwithstanding Article 17(1) of the SFD Regulation, that Regulation
text_raw:
4. Notwithstanding Article 17(1) of the SFD Regulation, that Regulation 

shall, with effect from 10 March 2022, apply to – 

(a) 

(b) 

insurance intermediaries which provide insurance advice with 
regard to insurance‐based investment products, and 

investment firms (within the meaning of the European Union 
(Markets in Financial Instruments) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 
375 of 2017) which provide investment advice, 

irrespective of their legal form, including natural persons and self‐employed 
persons, that employ fewer than 3 persons. 

1 OJ No. L317, 9.12.2019, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L317, 9.12.2019, p. 1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd April, 2021.
